name: get_notifications
description: Retrieves Android notifications, with an option to filter the results.

sender_name.description: An optional filter for the sender or group name. If provided, this must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

app_name.description: Specifies the application name used to filter notifications. This must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

unread.description: A boolean that filters notifications by their read status. If `True` (the default), fetches only unread notifications and marks them as read. If `False`, fetches only read notifications without changing their status.

name: reply_notification
description: Reply to a notification identified by its unique bundle `key` using the provided `message_body` and `recipient_name`. This function returns a confirmation, including details like the number of replies sent and optional UI content. The `app_name` is an optional parameter, and while `app_package_name` is accepted for API compatibility, it is not currently utilized.

key.description: A unique bundle identifier for the notification to reply to. It must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

message_body.description: The text content of the reply message. It must be a non-empty string.

recipient_name.description: The display name of the recipient. It must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

app_name.description: An optional application name for the reply. If provided, it must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

app_package_name.description: An optional package name, not used in the current implementation but validated for API compatibility. If provided, it must be a non-empty string with a maximum length of 256 characters.

name: reply_notification_message_or_contact_missing
description: Handles reply attempts where the message body or recipient is missing. This function is invoked when a user attempts to reply without providing the required message content or recipient name.
